message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product to me, but I would like to propose a lower price of $9,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to drop the price to $9,500, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $9,200 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
